named-query.name: Group.findScheduleScoreDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.ScheduleScoreDto( ga.id, ga.matchdayNbr, ga.officialNbr, ga.scheduledTipoff, ga.actualTipoff, ar.id, ar.name, roh.id, clh.name, clh.code, teh.ordinalNbr, sch.finalScore, roa.id, cla.name, cla.code, tea.ordinalNbr, sca.finalScore, CASE WHEN sch.finalScore IS NOT NULL AND sca.finalScore IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END, CASE WHEN SIZE(psh) > 0 OR SIZE(psa) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END, CASE WHEN gmh.withdrawn = TRUE OR gma.withdrawn = TRUE THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END, cm.type ) FROM Roster ro JOIN ro.season se JOIN ro.groupMembers gm JOIN gm.group gr JOIN gr.groupLabel gl JOIN gr.round rd JOIN rd.competition cm JOIN gr.games ga JOIN ga.arena ar JOIN ga.scores sch JOIN ga.scores sca LEFT JOIN sch.playerStats psh LEFT JOIN sca.playerStats psa JOIN sch.roster roh JOIN sca.roster roa JOIN roh.groupMembers gmh JOIN roa.groupMembers gma JOIN roh.team teh JOIN roa.team tea JOIN teh.club clh JOIN tea.club cla WHERE sch.home = TRUE AND sch.roster.id = ro.id AND sca.home = FALSE AND sca.roster.id <> ro.id AND rd.id = :roundId AND gl.code = :groupCode GROUP BY ga.id, gmh.withdrawn, gma.withdrawn ORDER BY CASE WHEN ga.actualTipoff IS NOT NULL THEN ga.actualTipoff ELSE ga.scheduledTipoff END DESC, ga.matchdayNbr, ga.officialNbr, ga.id

named-query.name: Roster.findCompetitionTypeScheduleScoreDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.ScheduleScoreDto( ga.id, ga.matchdayNbr, ga.officialNbr, ga.scheduledTipoff, ga.actualTipoff, ar.id, ar.name, roh.id, clh.name, clh.code, teh.ordinalNbr, sch.finalScore, roa.id, cla.name, cla.code, tea.ordinalNbr, sca.finalScore, CASE WHEN sch.finalScore IS NOT NULL AND sca.finalScore IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END, CASE WHEN SIZE(psh) > 0 OR SIZE(psa) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END, CASE WHEN gmh.withdrawn = TRUE OR gma.withdrawn = TRUE THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END, cm.type ) FROM Roster ro JOIN ro.season se JOIN ro.groupMembers gm JOIN gm.group gr JOIN gr.groupLabel gl JOIN gr.round rd JOIN rd.competition cm JOIN gr.games ga JOIN ga.arena ar JOIN ga.scores sch JOIN ga.scores sca LEFT JOIN sch.playerStats psh LEFT JOIN sca.playerStats psa JOIN sch.roster roh JOIN sca.roster roa JOIN roh.groupMembers gmh JOIN roa.groupMembers gma JOIN roh.team teh JOIN roa.team tea JOIN teh.club clh JOIN tea.club cla WHERE sch.home = TRUE AND sch.roster.id = ro.id AND sca.home = FALSE AND sca.roster.id <> ro.id AND (sch.roster.id = :rosterId OR sca.roster.id = :rosterId) AND cm.type = :competitionType GROUP BY ga.id, gmh.withdrawn, gma.withdrawn ORDER BY CASE WHEN ga.actualTipoff IS NOT NULL THEN ga.actualTipoff ELSE ga.scheduledTipoff END DESC, ga.matchdayNbr, ga.officialNbr, ga.id
